title: "Task Wallpapers"
content: Task Wallpapers is the perfect solution for anyone who wants to stay organized and productive. Our simple graphic wallpaper features a digital calendar or to-do list, with space for notes and reminders. With this wallpaper, you'll always have a visual reminder of your tasks and appointments, helping you stay on top of your busy schedule. Whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who wants to be more organized, Task Wallpapers is the ideal choice for you. So why wait? Download our wallpaper today and start getting things done!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a digital calendar or to-do list, with space for notes and reminders."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
